attributes.action: Help persecution of christians in the middle east
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Christians are suffering greatly in the middle east. Many are murdered because of their belief in Jesus.

Please people out there with a heart sign my petition. The news hardly reports on these incidents.

The world needs to know what is happening to christians out there.

I call upon the EU and UN to do something about this.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.  Can I suggest that you rename your petition "Help stop the persecution of Christians in the Middle East".
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
